_header: From God and heaven a long parting
Subjects: sermons, verse in; sin, results of
_description: Three results of sin — three lines in a sermon

CULKk424.Transcription:
ffrom god & heuene a longe partyngto hel in fendes &
                    homage makynga schameful endyng
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 190.
